Uses of Class
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TCard

  • Uses of TCard in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

    Subclasses of TCard in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  TBillboardCard
    TBillboardCard objects are a specialization of TCard objects, that is they are tombola cards representing the six special cards traditionally composing the tombola billboard. They all have 15 numbers each, but they are usually disposed on three rows with 5 number cells each, with no spaces. Numbers are also displaced following a criteria that is substantially different from "normals" cards.
    Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that return TCard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TCard TSeries.getCard​(int index)
    Return the card in index position within the series
    TCard[] TMakeSix.prepareSix()
    This is the king of the party! Using a funny and smart heuristic, with some randomness, this method generates six cards (a 'series') having no number in common, so using all 90 available numbers.
    TCard TCardFormatter.stringToCard​(java.lang.String cardString)
    Convert a string representing a tombola card to a TCard object, trying to auto-detect its format among the CSV, CSV_PLUS, CSV_PACKED and CSV_PACKED_PLUS.
    TCard TCardFormatter.stringToCard​(java.lang.String cardString, TCardFormat format)
    Convert a string representing a tombola card (see TCardFormatter.cardToString(TCard)) into a TCard object, NOT considering information related to a Tombola game (i.e. extracted numbers matched on the card). The TCard object is returned as it has just created by a constructor. The input string must be in the TCardFormat passed as second parameter.
    Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that return types with arguments of type TCard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<TCard> TAward.getCandidatesList()
    Helping list used to maintain cards hitting the score for the award while checking all the playing cards within a game (@linkplain TGame}.
    java.util.List<TCard> TAward.getWinnerList()
    To properly manage winners during a tombola game, to each award is associated a list of cards that, as the game progresses, will maintain references to the card or the cards winning the award.
    Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib with parameters of type TCard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean TGame.addCardToTheGame​(TCard newCard)  
    java.lang.String TCardFormatter.cardToString​(TCard card)
    Convert a TCard object in a textual representation contained in a string, using the default parameters (format, use of jolly, delimiters) set for this TCardFormat object.
    java.lang.String TCardFormatter.cardToString​(TCard card, int cardId, int cardSetId, TCardFormat format, boolean jollyOn)
    TODO(1.1) Write comment here This method has been added in a second moment to support SQL files.
    java.lang.String TCardFormatter.cardToString​(TCard card, TCardFormat format, boolean jollyOn)
    Convert a TCard object in a textual representation contained in a string. Several format are supported, see TCardFormat values for further information. If the card is participating in a Tombola game, matched numbers are highlighted using asterisks of, for the jolly number, exclamation marks.
    int TCard.compareByCard​(TCard other)
    This method compare two cards (this one and the other one) looking for equal numbers between them. The amount of equal numbers found is both returned and internally saved within the state of this or the other card whenever it is higher of eventually previous saved values. Consider this method as an helping method mainly used by card sets generator algorithms to check/reduce/eliminate cards "too equal" each other, thus with higher probability to lead to concurrent wins.
    int TCard.compareByRow​(TCard other)
    This method compare two cards (this one and the other one) row by row looking for equal numbers. 9 rows couples are compared and the maximum amount of equal numbers between one of this couples is both returned and saved within the state of this or the other card whenever it is higher of eventually previous saved values. Consider this method as an helping method used within card sets generator algorithms to check/reduce/eliminate cards resulting "too equal" each other, thus with higher probability to lead to concurrent wins.
    Constructors in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib with parameters of type TCard 
    Constructor Description
    TSeries​(TCard[] cards)
    Create a TSeries instance using the 6 TCard objects passed as input argument.  Controls on conformity are minimal, for performance reason (see TMakeSix).
